channel.title: Pop up on start up " No Command arguments supllied! "
channel.description:
Good day,
On every startup of both the Workstation and the Gateway, I get this pop up :
![Capture|362x141](upload://97z6XMhmefTHEKwmPcCXSPVSktW.jpeg)
I'm using Whonix 14 on VM VirtualBox.
Is that normal or should I configure something to make it disappear ?
Thank you for your support.

item.title: Pop up on start up " No Command arguments supllied! "

item.title: Pop up on start up " No Command arguments supllied! "
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi Cottonwoodhill

Please use the forum search engine before posing support requests. A search for No Command arguments supplied! Usage: kdesudo [-u ] will produce several hits including this newer thread which has a solution.

https://forums.whonix.org/t/kdesudo-error-popup-window-sdwdate-gui/5642

Read full topic
